summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting electrical overhead and underground distribution easements over portions of Section 12, Township 23 North, Range 3 East, W.M., Plat of Lake Dell, Seelye Addition, Section 21, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W.M., Joseph S. Allen's Addition, Sumners Addition, Lake Forest Park First Addition, H.E. Orr Park Division Number 5, Fischer's Highway Garden Tracts Number 2, Coffman Garden Tracts, Wallis County Club Tracts, Tract "A" of Arroyo Beach, Wallis Country Club Tracts, and placing said easements under the jurisdiction of the City Light Department.
